arv13:9: Iha bhikṣavo bhikṣur-adhyātmaṁ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati | ātāpī saṁprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyā-daurmanasye | bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati | adhyātma-bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati | ātāpī saṁprajānan smṛtimān, vinīya loke abhidhyā-daurmanasye ||
arv13:10: Adhyātma-vedanāsu bahirdhā-vedanāsu adhyātma-bahirdhā | vedanāsu vedanānudarśī viharati | ātāpī saṁprajānan smṛtimān, vinīya loke abhidhyā-daurmanasye ||
arv13:11: Adhyātma-citte bahirdhā-citte adhyātma-bahirdhā citte cittānudarśī viharati | ātāpī saṁprajānan smṛtimān, vinīya loke abhidhyā-daurmanasye ||
arv13:12: Adhyātma-dharmeṣu bahirdhā-dharmeṣu adhyātma-bahirdhā dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati | ātāpī saṁprajānan smṛtimān, vinīya loke abhidhyā-daurmanasye ||
